title: Example Note by matsu
text:
This note demonstrates the usability of the Note Taking application by matsu.

     - A note can be written by typing in the title/body text fields.
     - A note can be saved by clicking the 'Save Note' button in the top right.
     - A note can be cleared by clicking the 'Clear Form' button also in the top right.
     - A saved note can be deleted by clicking the red trash can icon that appears next 
       to the note title in the sidebar to the left.
